Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27651 affecting package buildah for versions less than 1.18.0-8
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-27651 affecting package buildah for versions less than 1.18.0-8. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package buildah is earlier than 1.18.0-8, affected by CVE-2022-27651
